title: Truck Mechanic NEW!
full_description: We are looking for a Lead Truck Mechanic to join our team!Responsibilities:Repair dump trucks, tractors, trailers and some small construction equipment.Practical experience with diesel emission systemsPerform routine vehicle maintenanceUse diagnostic tools to test vehicle componentsPerform quality inspections prior to returning the vehicle to the customerQualifications:Previous experience as a mechanicKnowledge of shop equipmentStrong mechanical aptitude and troubleshooting skillsDeadline and detail-orientedAbility to thrive in a fast-paced environment
